column1: #Text=Pathik says : " The only way is to let her go . "
#Text=Iroh says : " You 've got to get out of here !
#Text=It 's taken a hundred years , but the Fire Nation has conquered Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Azula says : " No , he betrayed you .
#Text=Zuko , when you return home , Father will welcome you as a war hero .
#Text=" Zuko says : " But I do n't have the Avatar .
#Text=What if Father does n't restore my honor ?
#Text=" Azula says : " He does n't need to , Zuko .
#Text=" Kuei says : " The Earth Kingdom ... has fallen .

#Text=" Main Aang Appa Iroh Katara Momo Sokka Toph Zuko Antagonists Azula Long Feng Mai Ty Lee says : " Minor Bosco Captured agent Dai Li agents Head of the Dai Li Kuei " Sokka says : " What are you doing in my mouth ?
#Text=Momo , you need to be a little more sensitive to my boundaries .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , I see , so there 's time to get your scrolls and time to get your staff , but no time for my boomerang ?
